channel.title: Pi help
channel.description: Hey guys, so in all my PvP minigames such as duel arena & fight pits, after everyone you need to kill is dead, your still in the Duel Arena/Fight Pits, your allowed to tele out but it is kind of a burden to have to teleport out after every game. But, you do tele out if the last player you killed logs out.

Post ur Duel Arena Class

Read full topic

item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

That isn’t a easy fix at all and that also leads to many dupes. i would disable dueling totally for most 317’s…
